transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan boliye madam.
Customer: Hello
Hanji good morning sir, se baat kare.
Executive: Good morning boliye. Haan mujhe malum malum hai boliye. Boliye madam.
Customer: Accha accha. Theek hai sir aap mujhe ek baar jo aapne apna executive appoint kiya hai aap mere unse baat kara doge ek baar.
Executive: Main aapko ek kaam karo. 10:30 ke aas paas call kar do barabar yahi number pe lagega na call ye number pe.
Customer: Haan nahi nahi main aapko message kar rahi hu. Hello. Main aapko WhatsApp pe message kar rahi hu us number pe call karana hai.
Executive: Okay theek hai karwata hu theek hai. Okay.
Customer: Haan haan main theek hai theek hai kab kara doge time bata sakte ho?
Executive: 10:30 10:30 ke aas paas call kar dunga main aapko barabar hai na haan.
Customer: Accha accha theek hai sir okay theek hai.
Executive: Okay theek hai okay.
Customer: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to talk to the appointed executive.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to call around 10:30 AM.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- executive, call, whatsapp
